context_of_use: The user interacts with the system to perform a specific action.
scope: User interaction with the system to achieve a desired outcome.
description: The user wants to perform action X to achieve outcome Y.
preconditions: User has access to the system.
assumptions: User understands how to perform action X.
requirements_met: System provides feedback on action X.
outstanding_issues: Clarification on the specifics of action X and outcome Y.
main_flow: 1. User initiates action X → System processes action X.
2. System provides confirmation of action X completion.
alternative_flows: AF-1 (from Step 1): User cancels action X → System aborts the process.
exception_flows: EF-1 (from Step 1): System encounters an error during action X → System displays error message.
information_for_steps: 2. User input required for action X.
